name: Dragon Flight (StarDragon)
description:
A tiny nokia based Shump for the nokiajam2

The theme being "Death is good."

You're a dragon that fights in the sky against various foes. When you die. Power yourself up with the points you gathered! Try to get to round 15!

Controls:

Numpad to move to a position.

Press the key again to fire.

0 to pause.

On the menu screen. Press 8 and 2 to scroll and 6 to select. Continue scrolling and select GO!

If you don't have a numpad. You can use space and arrow keys. escape to pause. tab to change grid style.
